message.agriculturalenhancements.harvest: Harvests crops up tp 9 blocks away
agriculturalenhancements.config.title: Agricultural Enhancements Config Settings
agriculturalenhancements.harvester.jei_i:
Fuel-powered block that harvests crop blocks up to nine blocks away from itself.
When placed, it faces away from the player.
Will consume fuel that exceeds the fuel storage only when the fuel level is lower than one unit of work (potentially wasteful with high-value modded fuels)
